00012 #define DIRENT(value) (*(struct dirent **) value)
00013 #define VIDEO ".*\\.mkv|mp4|mov|ogm|avi|divx|rm|rmvb|flv|part|wmv$"
00014 #define AUDIO  ".*\\.mp3|m4a|flac|ogg|m4b|aiff|ac3|aac|wav|wmv|ape$"

00017 void media(char *path, char **args,int argc) {
00018  struct dirent **files;
00019  
00020  // gets dir listing ignoring case and matching the patten
00021  int file_num = scandir_b( path, &files,
00022   ^ (struct dirent * s) { 
00023    return match(s->d_name ,VIDEO);
00024   },
00025   ^ (const void * a, const void * b) {
00026    return strcasecmp( DIRENT(a)->d_name, DIRENT(b)->d_name);
00027   }
00028  );
00029  
00030 
00031  char *sa[file_num+1];
00032  int total_length = 0;
00033  for(int i =0 ; i<file_num-1;++i){ 
00034   sa[i] = files[i]->d_name;
00035   total_length += strlen(sa[i]);
00036  }
00037  sa[file_num-1] ="";
00038  mplayer(sa,total_length,"","",path);
00039 }

00043 void mplayer(char **filenames, int total_length, 
00044   char *prefix_args, char *postfix_args, char *filepath) {
00045 
00046  int index   = strlen(filepath) + 3; // 3 for cd 
00047  char *rid   = " &> /dev/null"; // discards output
00048  int rid_len = strlen(rid);
00049  char m_args[total_length +  // 8 for mplayer
00050   strlen(prefix_args) + strlen(postfix_args) + index + rid_len+ 8];
00051  
00052  strcpy(m_args, "cd ");
00053  strcpy(&m_args[3], filepath);
00054  m_args[index++] = ';';
00055  m_args[index++] = ' ';
00056  strcpy(&m_args[index], "mplayer "); 
00057  index += 8;
00058  
00059  // append filenames
00060  while (**filenames != '\0'){
00061   printf("%s\n", *filenames);
00062   m_args[index++] = '"';
00063   
00064   strcpy(&m_args[index], *filenames);
00065   index += strlen(*filenames);
00066   
00067   m_args[index++] = '"';
00068   m_args[index++] = ' ';
00069   ++filenames;
00070  }
00071  
00072  strcpy(&m_args[index], rid);
00073  index +=rid_len;
00074  
00075  m_args[index] = '\0';
00076  printf("%s\n", m_args);
00077  system(m_args);
00078 }                                            
00079 
00081 int match(const char *string, char *pattern) {
00082  int    status;
00083  regex_t    re;
00084 
00085  if (regcomp(&re, pattern, REG_EXTENDED | REG_ICASE | REG_NOSUB) != 0) {
00086   return(0);      
00087  }
00088  status = regexec(&re, string, (size_t) 0, NULL, 0);
00089  regfree(&re);
00090  
00091  return !(status !=0);
00092  
00093 }
